example.text: But for most of America, it is just not that complicated. Sometimes I just get frustrated with the language and the things that are coming out of not just the administration but with the things that are happening in our Federal Government right now that, I think, just need to be called out and for us to say: Let's as a Senate sit down and talk about some of these complicated issues.

My team and I were directly submitted a "friend of the court" brief to make the argument for freedom to the Justices. The Court renewed the right for people of all faiths to live their faith, change their faith, or have no faith.
Can I just tell you? I won't find very many Americans who would say: We only want part of the illegal sex offenders in the country.

For the first time in 98 days Biden will finally sit down to talk about the debt ceiling with Speaker McCarthy. Republicans have been united: we will not raise the debt limit without addressing our out of control spending.
Israel continues to try to keep people safe from terrorism and work toward lasting peace. We want the people of Israel to know that Americans continue to stand beside our friend and ally.

SIGN UP to receive my e-newsletter direct to your inbox. If you would like more information on these topics or any other legislation currently before the US Senate, please do not hesitate to call my DC office at (202) 224-5754.
